alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 08 at 4:01PM AKST until February 09 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Aleutians. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak winds are expected late Thursday morning through Thursday afternoon. Significant reductions in visibility are possible in blowing snow. However, temperatures will warm above freezing and result in wet snow that will not easily become lofted by winds. There remains some uncertainty regarding how quickly snow will transition to rain or a rain snow mix.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must travel.
